translations: n．打击乐手：演奏打击乐器的音乐家。
这个乐队有两位打击乐手。

sentences.sentence: Nick's now got a good selection of percussionists to really get the beat going.
sentences.translation: 尼克已经组建了一支不错的打击乐队，可以进行演奏了。

sentences.sentence: My musical director wasn't happy with the performance of one of our percussionists.
sentences.translation: 我的音乐总监对我们一名打击乐手的表现很不满意。

sentences.sentence: The musical director wasn't happy with the performance of one of our percussionists.
sentences.translation: 我们的乐队指挥对乐队打击乐手的表现不甚满意。
